greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: number of circular permutations of [1..n] with k modular progressions of rise 1, distance 1 and length 3 (n >= 3, 0 <= k <= n).
reference: Wayne M. Dymacek, Isaac Lambert and Kyle Parsons, Arithmetic Progressions in Permutations, http://math.ku.edu/~ilambert/CN.pdf, 2012.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 15 2012
